mapper.select: SELECT g.*, ht.teamName as homeTeamName, at.teamName as awayTeamName, v.venueName, p.bookingOpenDaysBefore, p.bookingOpenTime, p.bookingCloseMinutesAfterStart, s.sportName FROM games g JOIN teams ht ON g.homeTeamId = ht.id JOIN teams at ON g.awayTeamId = at.id JOIN venues v ON g.venueId = v.id JOIN sport_booking_policies p ON g.sportId = p.sportId JOIN sports s ON g.sportId = s.id WHERE g.gameDate >= #{today} AND g.gameDate < #{firstDayOfNextMonth} AND s.sportName = #{sport} ORDER BY g.gameDate, g.gameTime

SELECT g.*, ht.teamName as homeTeamName, ht.shortName as homeTeamShortName, at.teamName as awayTeamName, at.shortName as awayTeamShortName, v.venueName, p.bookingOpenDaysBefore, p.bookingOpenTime, p.bookingCloseMinutesAfterStart FROM games g JOIN teams ht ON g.homeTeamId = ht.id JOIN teams at ON g.awayTeamId = at.id JOIN venues v ON g.venueId = v.id JOIN sport_booking_policies p ON g.sportId = p.sportId JOIN sports s ON g.sportId = s.id WHERE ht.shortName = #{shortName} AND g.gameDate BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND s.sportName = #{sport} ORDER BY g.gameDate, g.gameTime
SELECT t.*, s.sportName FROM teams t JOIN sports s ON t.sportId = s.id WHERE t.teamName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR t.shortName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') LIMIT 1
SELECT v.*, s.sportName, t.shortName as teamShortName FROM venues v JOIN sports s ON v.sportId = s.id JOIN teams t ON v.teamId = t.id WHERE v.venueName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') LIMIT 1
SELECT v.venueName, v.address FROM venues v JOIN teams t ON v.teamId = t.id JOIN sports s ON t.sportId = s.id WHERE s.sportName = #{sport} AND t.shortName = #{shortName}

SELECT s.id AS seatId, s.seatName, tt.name AS ticketTypeName, p.price, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT p2.ticketTypeId) FROM prices p2 WHERE p2.seatId = s.id) AS rowspan FROM seats s JOIN prices p ON s.id = p.seatId JOIN ticket_types tt ON p.ticketTypeId = tt.id JOIN teams t ON s.teamId = t.id JOIN sports sp ON t.sportId = sp.id WHERE sp.sportName = #{sport} AND t.shortName = #{shortName} ORDER BY s.id, tt.id
